articles.author: Ortenca Aliaj, Antoine Gara
articles.title: Potential $3.5bn windfall for Donald Trump hangs on fight over Spac deal - Financial Times
articles.description: Litigation with a former partner hangs over Friday’s vote to take Truth Social network public
articles.content: A legal stand-off between Donald Trump and a former business partner is coming to a head, with a vote set to determine whether or not the former US president can unlock a potential $3.5bn windfall by… [+4126 chars]
